snippet.title: Kaiju Kite Attack THE FIRST EVER SHMUP-PLATFORMER ***Official Release Trailer***
snippet.description:
Go to STEAM!!! Buy your copy NOW!!! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120640/Kaiju_Kite_Attack/

"Kaiju Kite Attack is one of the wildest, craziest and most exciting shoot 'em ups of the year!" - Defunct Games https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0zuOc8iReq0

Kaiju Kite Attack is a 2d, retro, weirdo platformer/shoot 'em up, where you fly kites and fight giant monsters! Wishlist NOW!!! Available for purchase OCT 1st 2019!

OH MY KAIJU!!! IT'S...KAIJU!!! KAIJU KITE ATTACK!!! Get your kite in the sky now! The Kaiju are coming to town to burn it down. Save your Meemaw! Save the universe! FLY OR DIE! 

Follow PWCA on Twitter for news on this and all other upcoming dimensions of fun and interactive exploration https://twitter.com/PWCAgames
